sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button :style="{width: btnwidth, height: btnheight}" @click="onClick()" class="btn">{{ text }}</button>
</template>

<script>

     export default {
        name: "Button",
        props: {
            text: {
                type: String
            },
            btnheight: {
                type: String,
                default: "50px"
            },
            btnwidth: {
                type: String,
                default: "200px"
            }
        },
        methods: {
            onClick() {
                // console.log("click");
                this.$emit('btn-click')
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>
    .btn {
        /* outline: 1px orange solid; */
        border-radius: 100px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        background: black;
        cursor: pointer;
        outline: none;
        border: none;
        padding-left: 10px;
        padding-right: 10px;
        color: white
    }

</style>
